CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 30, 1953, pg. 22, reads: "Hereford Dancers Are Tops in 'Show of Shows' - Victor Hereford and His Creative Dancers lived up to their superlative advance billing Monday evening when they presented their 'Show of Shows' at Schenley High School. Here are two scenes from the performance. [captions are on incorrect images in print]... pictured are David Gittings and Dianne Littlejohn who also appeared. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dianne Littlejohn in hula skirt and lei, and David Gittings in Caribbean costume performing in Victor Hereford and His Creative Dancers's "Show of Shows" dance program on stage in Schenley High School auditorium
